property.name: sqlPurge
property.value: DELETE FROM ${database.schema}.line WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT distinct lineId FROM ${database.schema}.route)

property.name: sqlInsert
property.value: INSERT INTO ${database.schema}.LINE ( ptnetworkid, companyid, objectid, objectversion, creationtime, creatorid, name, NUMBER, publishedname, transportmodename, registrationnumber, COMMENT, mobilityrestrictedsuitable, userneeds) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

property.name: sqlSelectByObjectIdWithInClause
property.value: SELECT id,objectid FROM ${database.schema}.LINE WHERE objectid IN (_OBJECTIDS_)

property.name: sqlUpdate
property.value: UPDATE ${database.schema}.LINE SET ptnetworkid = ?, companyid = ?, objectid = ?, objectversion = ?, creationtime = ?, creatorid = ?, name = ?, NUMBER = ?, publishedname = ?, transportmodename = ?, registrationnumber = ?, COMMENT = ?, mobilityrestrictedsuitable = ?, userneeds = ? WHERE objectid = ?
